title: Motta lauds Juventus´ consistency following Milan triumph
description: Thiago Motta applauded Juventus’ consistency after inflicting Sergio Conceicao’s first defeat as AC Milan’s head coach after their 2-0 win at the Allianz Stadium on Saturday. Juventus, who are yet to lose this season, moved into the top four of the Serie A standings thanks to second-half goals from Samuel Mbangula and Timothy Weah. The […] The post Motta lauds Juventus´ consistency following Milan triumph appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: Excellent finish from Aston Villa striker Ollie Watkins denies Arsenal crucial victory in Premier League title race (Video)
description: Arsenal were on their way to book three important points in the Premier League title race when Gabriel Martinelli and Kai Havertz put them two goals ahead against Aston Villa at the Emirates on Saturday. But the visitors had other ideas, and after Youri Tielemans halved their deficit on the hour mark, Ollie Watkins struck […] The post Excellent finish from Aston Villa striker Ollie Watkins denies Arsenal crucial victory in Premier League title race (Video) appeared first on Soccer News.
author: Veselin Trajkovic
